availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George T. Seaton (Jefferson County, Kentucky, deputy marshal)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, deputy marshal. Kentucky native. Son of Harvey Seaton and Ophelia Seaton. Attended school in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Apprentice policeman in Jefferson County in 1860. Deputy marshal in Jefferson County in 1863. Sheriff in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville District 3, p. 325B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 6, p. 360.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Jefferson County, KY, June 1863, p. 434.
"Election Notice," The Louisville Daily Journal (Louisville, KY), March 31, 1864, p. 2.
"George T. Seaton (1842-1908)," Find A Grave, Memorial 130424066, accessed September 19, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/130424066.
